src_original: cakrāṅkitahastapādatā,
tgt_original: 手足輪者，手足掌中，有千輻輪，具足明了，如印文現。

src_original: supratiṣṭhitapādatā,
tgt_original: 足安住不動，名足安立相。

src_original: jālahastapādatā,  mṛdutaruṇahastapādatā,
tgt_original: 網縵軟薄，猶如鵝王；

src_original: saptocchrayatā,
tgt_original: 畫文明了，如真金縷故，名手足網相。 柔軟猶如兜羅樹綿、如嬰兒體，其色紅赤，勝身餘分，名為手足柔軟相。 手掌、足下、項上、兩腋，七處俱滿故，名七處滿相。

src_original: dīrghāṅgulitā,
tgt_original: 脩指纖𦟛故，名長指相。

src_original: ucchaṅkhapādatā,  ūrdhvaṃgaromatā,  eṇeyajaṅghatā,  paṭūrubāhutā,  kośāvahitavastiguhyatā,  suvarṇavarṇatā,  ślaksṇacchavitā,
tgt_original: 足跟長廣故，名足跟廣相。 身長七肘不曲故，名身直大相。 足上隆起故，名足趺高相。

src_original: ekaikapradakṣiṇāvartaromatā,  ūrṇāṅkitamukhatā,
tgt_original: 毛上向右旋故，名毛上旋相。

src_original: siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatā,  susaṃvṛtaskandhatā,  citāntarāṃsatā,  rasarasajñatā,  nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatā,  uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā,  pṛthutanujihvatā,
tgt_original: 𦟛󰈷漸麁，如伊泥鹿󰈷故，名鹿󰈷相。 平立兩手摩膝故，名長臂相。

src_original: gopakṣmanetratā ceti,  tatra cakrāṅkitahastapāda iti cakrāṇi tathāgatasya hastapādatale jātāni bhavanti,  sahasrārāṇi (PSP_6-8:62)
tgt_original: 一一孔一毛生故，名一一毛相。 眉間白毫光如珂雪故，為白毛相。

src_original: samaṃ pāṇitalābhyāṃ pṛthivīsaṃsparśanād asaṃkucitatvāt pādayoḥ supratisthitapāṇipādatā,  haṃsarājasyeva jālapinaddhāṅgulipāṇipādatvāj jālahastapādaḥ,  tūlapicūpamataruṇasukumāratālakomalapāṇipādatvād mṛdutaruṇahastapādaḥ samucchritahastapādaḥ,  āyatahastapādāṅgulitvād dīrghāṅguliḥ,  dīrghapārṣṇitvād āyatapārṣṇiḥ,
tgt_original: 肩圓大故，名肩圓大相。 腋下平滿故，名腋下滿相。 舌根不為風寒熱所壞故，善分別諸味，餘人不爾故，名知味味相。

src_original: saptār abhyucchritatvād avakragātratvād bṛhadṛjugātraḥ,  uccaiḥ sunigūḍhajānugulphatvād ucchaṅkhapādaḥ,  ūrdhvapradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalaromatvād ūrdhvāṅgaromā,  śarabhaiṇeyeyajaṅghatvād anupahatatvād anupūrvopacitavṛttajaṅghatvāc caiṇeyajaṅghaḥ,  samorubāhutvād avanatasya pāṇitalābhyāṃ jānumaṇḍalasparśanāt paṭūrubāhuḥ,  paramābhirūpakośanigūḍhamehanatvād vastyaśvājāneyavatkośāvahitavastiguhyaḥ,  uttaptahāṭakasuvarṇavarṇatvāt  suvarṇavarṇaḥ,
tgt_original: 身縱廣等，如尼駒樓樹故，名圓身相。

src_original: vātapittaśleṣmābhir anupahatasamanatvād rasarasapratibhāvanatvāt sadṛśavijñānatvāc ca rasarasajñaḥ,  kāyasya vyāmasamārohapariṇāhapramāṇatvān nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalaḥ,  vṛttaparimaṇḍaladakṣiṇā vartoṣṇīṣasamānasū pahitadarśanīyaśiraskatvād uṣṇīṣaśirāḥ,  raktotpalapattrasamavarṇāpatatvāt pṛthutanujihvaḥ,
tgt_original: 舌如赤蓮華，廣長而薄故，名廣長舌相。

src_original: hiraṇyagarbhakalaviṅkaśakunisadṛśasvaratvād brahmasvaraḥ,
tgt_original: 聲如梵王、迦陵頻伽鳥故，名梵音相。

src_original: ādarśamaṇḍalavatsuparivṛttopacitadarśanīyahanutvāt siṃhahanuḥ,
tgt_original: 頰圓廣如鏡故，名師子頰相。 齒白如珂雪、如君坻華故，名齒白相。

src_original: anunnatadantatvāt samadantaḥ,  nirantaratvād aviraladantaḥ,
tgt_original: 平齊不參差故，名齒齊相。 齒密緻不疎故，名具足齒相。

src_original: adha ūrdhvaṃ cānatiriktatvāt samacatvāriṃśaddantaḥ,
tgt_original: 齒上下相當故，名四十齒相。

src_original: kṛṣṇaśubhradeśānupakliṣṭasuviśuddhatvāl lohitarājibhir apinaddhatvāc cābhinīlanetraḥ,
tgt_original: 眼白黑分明，淨無赤脈故，名紺青眼相。

src_original: adhaḥsthitānām ūrdhvasthitānāṃ ca samygavanatatvād (PSP_6-8:63)  asaṃluḍitatvāc ca pakṣmaṇo gopakṣmanetras tathāgato bhavati.
tgt_original: 𥇒不交亂、上下俱眴、不長不短故，名為牛王𥇒相。

src_original: tataḥ cakrāṅkahastapādo bhavati gurūṇām anugamanapratyudgamanābhyāṃ dharmaśravaṇamālyopahāracaityānuyānaprabhṛtiṣu parivāradānāc cakrāṅkahastapādo
tgt_original: 於諸所尊迎送恭敬，於塔寺中、大法會處、說法處，供給人使故，得手足輪相。

src_original: tat punar mahāparivāratāyāḥ,  pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 有是相故，在家作轉輪聖王，多得人民； 出家學道，多得徒眾。

src_original: dṛḍhasamādānatvāt supratiṣṭhitapāṇipādas tad akampanīyatāyāḥ pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 所受諸法，堅持不捨，故得安立足相。 有是相故，無能傾動。

src_original: caturṇāṃ saṃgrahavastūnāṃ dānapriyavadyārthacaryāsamānārthatānām āsevanāj jālahastapādas tat kṣiprasaṃgrahatāyāḥ pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 常修四攝法： 布施、愛語、利益、同事故，得手足網縵相。 有是相故，速攝人眾。

src_original: praṇītānām aśitapītalīḍhakhāditāsvāditān ādānāt mṛdutaruṇahastapādaḥ,  saptocchrayaś vā tad ubhayaṃ praṇītānām evāśitapītalīḍhakhāditāsvāditānāṃ pratilabdhaye pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 以諸香甘美濡飲食，供施於人及諸所尊，供給所須故，得手足柔軟相及七處隆滿相。 有是相故，多得香甘美軟飲食。

src_original: vadhyaparimokṣaṇāj jīvitānugrahakaraṇāt prāṇātipātāc ca prativirater āsevanād dīrghāṅgulir āyatapādapārṣṇir bṛhadṛjugātraś ca tad dīrghāyuṣkatāyāḥ
tgt_original: 救免應死、及增壽命、又受不殺戒故，得纖長指相、足跟滿相、身大直相。 有是相故，壽命長遠。

src_original: kuśalasya dharmasamādānasyopāttasyābhivardhanād aparihāṇāc cocchaṅkhapādaś cordhvāṅgaromā ca tad aparihāṇidharmatāyā vinaye vā pūrvamimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 所受善法增益不失故，得足趺高、毛上向右旋相。 有是相故，得諸功德不退失。

src_original: satkṛtyaśilpavidyākarmaṇām upapradānād upādānapradānāc caiṇeyajaṅghas tat kṣipragrahaṇatāyāḥ pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 能以技藝及諸經書教授不惜，及履屣等施故，得伊尼鹿󰈷相。 有是相故，諸所修學速疾如意。

src_original: svataḥ saṃvidyamānasyārthasya yācitena dānād apratyākhyānāc ca paṭūrubāhus tad vaśitāyāḥ pradāne vinaye vā pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 有來求索，無所遺惜故，得𦟛長臂相。 有是相故，能得勢力、能大布施。

src_original: mitrasvajanasaṃbandhisaṅgatānām anyonyāviprayojanād viprayuktānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ brahmacaryasamādānād guhyamantrarakṣaṇāc ca kośāvahitamastiguhyas tad bahuputratāyāḥ pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 能善調人，不令眾生親里遠離； 若有乖離，還令和合，故得陰藏相。 有是相故，多得弟子。

src_original: praṇītānām upastaraṇaprāvaraṇanivāsanānāṃ prāsādavimānabhavanānāñ ca dānāt suvarṇavarṇaḥ
tgt_original: 以好淨潔衣服、臥具、樓閣、房舍施故，得金色相及皮膚薄相。

src_original: ślakṣṇacchaviś ca tad ubhayaṃ praṇītānām evopastaraṇaprāvaraṇanivāsanānāṃ prāsādavimānabhavanānāṃ
tgt_original: 有是相故，得好淨潔衣服、臥具、樓閣、房舍。

src_original: saṃgaṇikāparivarjanād upādhyāyācāryamātāpitṛbhrātṛprabhṛtīnāṃ ca gurūṇāṃ yathānurūpopasthānaniveśanāt  tad adhyakṣāpradānāc ca vikṛtānām ekaikapradakṣiṇāvartaromā ūrṇāṅkitamukhaś ca tad
tgt_original: 隨所應供養和尚、阿闍梨、父母、兄弟及所尊重善，能衛護故，得一一孔一毛生，毛右旋相、白毛莊嚴面相。

src_original: apratisamatāyāḥ pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 有是相故，無與等者。

src_original: amukharavacanād anavasādanāt priyavāditvāt subhāṣitānuromatvāc ca siṃhapūrvārdhakāyaḥ,
tgt_original: 慚愧語、隨順語、愛語，故得上身如師子相、肩圓大相。

src_original: rasarasajñaś ca tad alpābādhatāyāḥ pūrvanimittam,
tgt_original: 有是相故，身少疾病。

src_original: vyādhitebhyo bhaiṣajyaparicārakacikitsakapathyabhojanānāṃ (PSP_6-8:64)  pradānād upasthānāc ca citāntarāṃsaḥ,
tgt_original: 供給疾病醫藥、飲食，身自看視，故得腋下滿相、得味味相。

src_original: ārāmasabhāśrayodapānadurgasaṃkramabhaktamālyavihārāvasathavihārakaraṇaprabhṛtiṣu pareṣām utsāhanapūrvaṅgamatvāt parebhyo 'bhyadhikapradānāc ca nyagrodhaparimaṇḍala uṣṇīṣaśirāś
tgt_original: 布施園林、甘果、橋梁、茂樹、池井、飲食、華香、瓔珞、房舍、起塔福舍等及共眾施時，能出多物，故得身如尼俱樓樹相及肉髻相。

src_original: ca tad ādhipatyapratilaṃbhāya pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 有是相故，得尊貴自在。

src_original: dīrgharātraślakṣṇapriyamadhuravacanābhidhānāt prabhūtajihvo brahmasvaraś ca tat pañcāṅgavākyathopetasya svarasya pratilabdhaye pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 長夜修習實語、軟語，故得廣長舌相、梵音聲相。

src_original: praṇītānām aśitapītalīḍhakhāditāsvāditān ādānāt mṛdutaruṇahastapādaḥ,  saptocchrayaś vā tad ubhayaṃ praṇītānām evāśitapītalīḍhakhāditāsvāditānāṃ pratilabdhaye pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 手足極柔軟，　　身相七處滿， 隨意食施故，　　多得自然供。

src_original: vadhyaparimokṣaṇāj jīvitānugrahakaraṇāt prāṇātipātāc ca prativirater āsevanād dīrghāṅgulir āyatapādapārṣṇir bṛhadṛjugātraś ca tad dīrghāyuṣkatāyāḥ
tgt_original: 長指廣脚跟，　　身𦟛大直相， 離殺因緣故，　　乃至於劫壽。 毛上向右旋，　　足趺隆高相，

src_original: satkṛtyaśilpavidyākarmaṇām upapradānād upādānapradānāc caiṇeyajaṅghas tat kṣipragrahaṇatāyāḥ pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 伊泥鹿𨄔相，　　常樂讀誦經， 為人說法故，　　疾得無上道。

src_original: svataḥ saṃvidyamānasyārthasya yācitena dānād apratyākhyānāc ca paṭūrubāhus tad vaśitāyāḥ pradāne vinaye vā pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 修臂下過膝，　　一切所有物， 求者無悋惜，　　隨意化導人。

src_original: mitrasvajanasaṃbandhisaṅgatānām anyonyāviprayojanād viprayuktānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ brahmacaryasamādānād guhyamantrarakṣaṇāc ca kośāvahitamastiguhyas tad bahuputratāyāḥ pūrvanimittaṃ,
tgt_original: 陰藏功德藏，　　善知離散故， 多得人天眾，　　淨慧眼為子。

src_original: praṇītānām upastaraṇaprāvaraṇanivāsanānāṃ prāsādavimānabhavanānāñ ca dānāt suvarṇavarṇaḥ
tgt_original: 薄皮耀金光，　　妙衣堂閣施，

src_original: citāṅgulayaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanty upacitavipulakuśalamūlāḥ,  anupūrvāṅgulayaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti anupūrvasamupārjitakuśalamūlāḥ,
tgt_original: 指肉充滿，善根充滿。 指漸次而長，次第集諸佛法。

src_original: gūḍhaśirāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti sunigūḍhakāyavāgmanaskarmāntājīvāḥ,
tgt_original: 脈覆不見，不覆身口意念。

src_original: nirgranthiśirāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti kleśagranthibhedakarāḥ,
tgt_original: 脈無麁結，破煩惱結。

src_original: gūḍhagulphāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti sunigūḍhadharmamatayaḥ,
tgt_original: 踝平不現，不隱藏法。

src_original: ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti sarvaviṣamanistārayitāraḥ,
tgt_original: 足不邪曲，度墮邪眾。

src_original: 10 siṃhavikrāntagāminaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti narasiṃhāḥ,  haṃsavikrāntagāminaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti rājahaṃsasadṛśavaihāyasagāminaḥ,  vṛṣabhavikrāntagāminaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti puruṣarṣabhāḥ,
tgt_original: 行如師子，是人中師子。 行如象王，是人象王。 行如鵝王，高飛如鴻。 行如牛王，人中最尊。

src_original: pradakṣiṇāvartagāminaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti pradakṣiṇamārgāḥ,  cārugāminaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti cārudarśanāḥ,  avakragātrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti nityam avakracittāḥ,  vṛttagātrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti viśuddhaguṇakhyāpayitāraḥ,  mṛṣṭagātrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti pramṛṣṭapāpadharmāṇāḥ,  anupūrvagātrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanty anupūrvadharmadeśikāḥ. 20 śucigātrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti kāyavāgmanaḥśaucasamanvāgatāḥ,  mṛdugātrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti svabhāvamṛducittāḥ,
tgt_original: 行時右旋，善說正道。

src_original: paripūrṇavyañjanāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti suparipūrṇadharmavinayāḥ,  pṛthucārumaṇḍalagātrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti pṛthucāruguṇākhyātāraḥ,
tgt_original: 身堅而直，讚堅牢戒。 身漸次大，次第說法。 普身諸分，大而端嚴，善能解說，大妙功德。 身相具足，具足法者。

src_original: samakramāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti sarvasattvasamacittāḥ,
tgt_original: 足步間等，等心眾生。

src_original: viśuddhanetrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti suviśuddhadarśanāḥ,  sukumāragātrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti sukumāradharmadeśikāḥ,
tgt_original: 其身淨潔，三業清淨。 身膚細軟，心性自軟。 身離塵垢，善見離垢。

src_original: adīnagātrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti nityam adīnacittāḥ,
tgt_original: 身不縮沒，心常不沒。

src_original: utsadagātrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanty utsannākuśalamūlāḥ. 30 susaṃhatanāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti kṣīṇapunarbhavasahagatāḥ,
tgt_original: 身無邊量，善根無量。 肌肉緊密，永斷後身。

src_original: vitimiraśuddhālokāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti suviśuddhadarśanāḥ,
tgt_original: 身色無闇，知見無闇。

src_original: vṛttakukṣayaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti vṛttasaṃpannaśiṣyāḥ,  mṛṣṭakukṣayaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti pramṛṣṭasaṃsāradoṣāḥ,  abhugnakukṣayaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti bhagnamānaśṛṅgāḥ,  kṣāmodarāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti dharmakṣayavinivartayitāraḥ,
tgt_original: 腹圓周滿，弟子行具。 腹淨鮮潔，善能了知生死過惡。 腹不高出，破憍慢山。 腹平不現，說平等法。

src_original: ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti pratividdhaparamagambhīradharmāṇaḥ,
tgt_original: 臍圓而深，通甚深法。

src_original: pradakṣiṇāvartanābhayaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti pradakṣiṇagrāhyupapannaśiṣyāḥ,
tgt_original: 臍畫右旋，弟子順教。

src_original: samantaprāsādikāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti samantaprāsādikaśiṣyasaṃghāḥ. 40 śucisamācārāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti paramaśucicittāḥ,
tgt_original: 身遍端嚴，弟子遍淨。 威儀鮮潔，心淨無比。

src_original: vyapagatatilakagātrāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti vyapagatākālopadeśadharmavinayāḥ,
tgt_original: 身無點子，無黑印法。

src_original: tūlasadṛśasukumārapāṇayaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti tūlasadṛśakāyalāghavapratilābhadharmadeśikāḥ,
tgt_original: 手濡勝兜羅綿，受化者身輕如毛。

src_original: uttuṅganāsāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti prajñātuṅgaparvatasthāḥ,
tgt_original: 鼻高隆直，住智高山。

src_original: śucināsāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti śucivinayajanasaṃpratipannāḥ. 60 viśālanayanāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti paraviśālakṣaṇabuddhadharmāṇaḥ,
tgt_original: 鼻中清淨，弟子清白。 眼廣而長，智慧廣遠。 睫不希踈，善擇眾生。

src_original: citapakṣmāṇaś  ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti citasattvakāyāḥ,  sitāsitakamalanayanāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti (PSP_6-8:67)
tgt_original: 眼白黑鮮淨，如青蓮華葉；

src_original: sitāsitakamaladalanayanābhiḥ prabalasurāsuravarayuvatibhir abhinanditāḥ,
tgt_original: 天人婇女，以好眼敬禮。

src_original: āyatabhruvaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti nityam āyatidarśinaḥ,
tgt_original: 眉高而長，名聞遠流。

src_original: ślakṣṇabhruvaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti śuklavinayakuśalāḥ,  samaromabhruvaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti samantadāṣajñāḥ,  snigdhabhruvaś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti kuśalamūlopasnehasnigdhasaṃtānajanavinayāḥ,  pīnāyatabhujāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti parapīnāyatavāhavaḥ,
tgt_original: 眉毛潤澤，善知軟法。

src_original: samakarṇāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti jitasamarāḥ,  anupahatakarṇendriyāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanty anupahatasattvavināyakāḥ. supariṇāmitalalāṭāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti sarvadṛṣṭikṛtavipariṇatāḥ,
tgt_original: 耳等相似，聞法者等。
